message: Let's split it evenly, it's the fairest way to start.
You had your chance, now it's my turn!
I'm willing to give you a slight advantage, but let's not push this too far.  We both need to get something.
Time's running out, I'm getting impatient!
We're both losing money with every round, let's come to a reasonable agreement.  This is my final offer before the money gets even worse.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still waiting for a good one
I'm not sure what you're waiting for, Alice.  This is our last chance to get anything at all.  Take it or leave it.
You're running out of time, I'm being generous
Alice, this is it.  If we don't agree now, we get nothing.  This is the best I can do, and it's a better deal for both of us than what we're facing.
Last chance, I'm taking most of it
Alice, this is it. We've both been stubborn, but this is our last chance. We both get something, or we both get nothing.  Let's end this.
